title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1160/98 of 2 June 1998 concerning the classification of certain goods in the Combined Nomenclature
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1160/98 of 2 June 1998 concerning the classification of certain goods in the Combined Nomenclature
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The goods described in column 1 of the annexed table are now classified within the Combined Nomenclature under the appropriate CN codes indicated in column 2 of the said table.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 June 1998.
For the Commission
Mario MONTI
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 151, 21. 5. 1998, p. 1.
ANNEX
>TABLE>
